question:
The Triple Billion targets was mentioned in news in association with the Country Cooperation Strategy 2019-23. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. It is an initiative of UNESCO.
  2. It involves protection of heritage sites as one of the targets.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The Triple Billion Targets is an initiative of WHO. These targets form the core of WHOâ€™s strategic plan for the next half decade. In line with this, the international body announced major reforms to modernise and strengthen its role as the global authority on public health in March, 2019. Statement 2 is incorrect: The Triple Billion Targets focus on the health sector. There are 3 targets: a billion more people benefitting from universal health coverage, one billion more people to be protected from health emergencies and one billion more people to enjoy better health and well-being.
